info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 16 at 11:10PM MST until December 17 at 9:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 20 expected. * WHERE...Central Mohave County including the Kingman area. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
